desc: The Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones are a premium set of headphones that feature Bluetooth connectivity, up to 40 hours of battery life, and on-ear controls for adjusting volume and switching tracks. They have a sleek, stylish design and come in a variety of colors. They also have a built-in microphone for taking calls and use the Apple W1 chip for easy and stable connectivity with Apple devices.
